title: Seeking Resume Feedback : Would Appreciate Suggestions on How to Enhance this!

comments.body:
I feel like u should check out r/resumes 
It's more curated for your need
bro don't doxx your personal details like this the internet isn't as safe as you think it is

Use Novo resume to recreate this.
 The project description is too bloody long.
And information presentation in general is uninviting to read
Dude you're doxxing yourself on the internet...take this down.
Don’t put two columns on the same page in the resume. ATS won’t be able to read it. Use default templates
